member.name: T:SQL_Database.DataAccess
member.summary: Class which contains methods handling database.
member.remarks: This class can search database and also adds new transaction to the database using stored procedures.

member.name: M:SQL_Database.DataAccess.GetTransactions(System.String)
member.summary: Public List method which search database for transactions by last name.
member.param: Last name of a person which transactions we're looking for.

member.name: M:SQL_Database.DataAccess.AddTransaction(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Public void method which adds new transaction to the database.
member.param: First name of a person which made a transaction.
Last name of a person which made a transaction.
Email of a person which made a transaction.
IP address of a network from which transaction was made.
Country from which transaction was made.
Credtic card number used to pay.
Credtic card type used to pay.
Amount of money used in transaction.

member.summary: Public static class helps with connection to database.

member.summary: Method which gets connection string to database from App.config
member.param: Name of a connection string to the database.

member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
